primary.headline: Interpreter Scheduling
primary.description: Coordinate onsite, phone, and virtual assignments with a single scheduler that updates in real-time.

secondary.headline: Compliance & Reporting
secondary.description: Auto-generate audit trails, certifications, and billing statements in minutes.

tertiary.headline: Multilingual Portal
tertiary.description: Give agencies, interpreters, and clients one portal to submit, approve, and track requests.

video.headline: Purpose-built for interpreters, translators, and agencies
video.description: Tasheel centralizes scheduling, billing, compliance, and interpreter management so your teams can focus on service delivery.

featuresSlider.headline: Capabilities that grow with every department
featuresSlider.subHeadline: Operations, compliance, billing, all in one workspace

features.title: Unified Case Management
features.description: Track interpreter requests from intake to completion with live status updates.

features.title: Interpreter Marketplace
features.description: Match jobs to certified interpreters automatically based on language, location, and availability.

features.title: Smart Billing
features.description: Sync rates, timesheets, and invoices with your finance stack in a click.

features.title: Accessibility-first
features.description: Support web, mobile, and kiosk requests with WCAG compliant flows.

featureLarge.headline: Build resilient language access programs
features: Centralize interpreter onboarding, credentialing, and renewals.
Keep agencies informed with automated notifications and reminders.
Monitor SLAs, performance metrics, and service quality in real-time.
Hand off billing, compliance, and reporting to Tasheel’s workflows.

featuresAccordion.headline: Integrations that keep requests moving
featuresAccordion.subHeadline: Tasheel connects your CRM, scheduling tools, finance stack, and virtual interpreting platforms.

items.title: Zoom Rooms
items.content: Spin up interpreter-enabled meetings with pre-assigned language channels and real-time notes.

items.title: Salesforce
items.content: Sync service requests, case updates, and interpreter dispatch activity with customer records.

items.title: Stripe & QuickBooks
items.content: Automate payouts, invoices, and reimbursements with built-in financial reconciliation.

items.title: Microsoft Teams
items.content: Launch secure language sessions directly from your collaboration tools.

items.title: Zapier
items.content: Trigger notifications, tasks, and forms across 5,000+ apps without writing code.

process.headline: From request to fulfillment in three steps

items.title: Submit
items.content: Agencies share language needs, documentation, and context via the portal.

items.title: Match
items.content: Tasheel pairs requests with certified interpreters and coordinates logistics.

items.title: Deliver
items.content: Track service delivery, gather feedback, and finalize billing in one workspace.

reviews.subHeadline: Validated by coordinators, administrators, and interpreters worldwide

items.content: Requests used to live in email threads. Tasheel gave us a source of truth overnight.

items.author: Mohammed S.
items.content: Our interpreters finally have a mobile flow that respects their schedules and rates.

items.author: Rania B.
items.content: Finance reconciliations went from days to an afternoon.

items.author: James P.
items.content: The compliance reporting alone paid for the rollout.

featuresList.subHeadline: Run public sector programs, healthcare systems, and enterprise partnerships on one platform.

items.title: 360° request visibility

items.title: Analytics that drive policy

testimonials.quote: Tasheel modernized how we deliver language services. The team onboarded every agency in weeks and our interpreters love the transparency.

pricing.headline: Flexible programs tailored to your delivery model

faq.headline: Frequently asked
faq.subHeadline: Everything you need to know about Tasheel’s language access suite

items.question: Does Tasheel support on-demand and scheduled services?
items.answer: Yes. Tasheel routes on-demand requests to available interpreters while managing scheduled appointments with calendar integrations.

items.question: Can we integrate Tasheel with our HR and finance systems?
items.answer: Tasheel integrates with major HRIS, payroll, and accounting platforms. Enterprise plans include custom connectors.

items.question: How long does implementation take?
items.answer: Pilot agencies can be live in under four weeks. Larger networks typically deploy within 60-90 days.

items.question: Is interpreter onboarding handled in the platform?
items.answer: Tasheel manages credential uploads, approvals, renewals, and reminders so coordinators always know who is eligible to work.

items.question: What support is included?
items.answer: All plans include help center access and live chat. Growth and Enterprise tiers add dedicated success resources.
